hero.title: Farhat Savings Center
hero.tagline: Your First Destination for Savings in Al-Zahira!
hero.beeOrderBtn: Shop via Bee Order (All of Damascus)

about.title: Our Story in the Heart of Damascus
about.content: Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Al-Zahira, Farhat Savings Center has been serving our community with quality groceries, fresh detergents, and delicious bakery items. We also provide convenient bill payment services and accept card payments through Fattoura. Our commitment to quality and savings makes us your trusted partner for all your daily needs.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Our story in serving the Al-Zahira community for over 15 years

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Our journey began in 2008 in the heart of Al-Zahira neighborhood in Damascus, where we started as a small grocery store with a clear vision to provide the best products and services to our local community.
story.p2: Over the years, we have evolved from a simple grocery store to a comprehensive savings center offering a wide range of products and services, including groceries, detergents, bakery items, and bill payment services.
story.p3: We are proud to be part of the Al-Zahira community and always strive to develop our services to meet our customers' growing needs.
